mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY CODE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (CODE, ID, REGDATE, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT, BOARDGROUP, COMMENTSTEP, COMMNETINDENT) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, SYSDATE, #{param2}, #{param3}, 0, BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0, 0)
